airtable.title: Airtable MCP Server
airtable.description: Provides AI assistants with direct access to Airtable bases, allowing them to read schemas, query records, and interact with your Airtable data. Supports listing bases, retrieving table structures, and searching through records to help automate workflows and answer questions about your organized data.

aks.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
aks.description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) official MCP server.

accessLevel.description: Access level for the MCP server, One of [ readonly, readwrite, admin ]

additionalTools.description: Comma-separated list of additional tools, One of [ helm, cilium ]

allowNamespaces.description: Comma-separated list of namespaces to allow access to. If not specified, all namespaces are allowed.

azureDir.description: Path to the Azure configuration directory (e.g. /home/azureuser/.azure). Used for Azure CLI authentication, you should be logged in (e.g. run `az login`) on the host before starting the MCP server.

containerUser.description: Username or UID of the container user (format <name|uid>[:<group|gid>] e.g. 10000), ensuring correct permissions to access the Azure and kubeconfig files. Leave empty to use default user in the container.

kubeconfig.description: Path to the kubeconfig file for the AKS cluster (e.g. /home/azureuser/.kube/config). Used to connect to the AKS cluster.

tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to enable. Can be either a tool category, a specific tool, or an Apify Actor. For example: "actors,docs,apify/rag-web-browser". For more details visit https://mcp.apify.com.

arxiv.title: ArXiv MCP Server
arxiv.description: The ArXiv MCP Server provides a comprehensive bridge between AI assistants and arXiv's research repository through the Model Context Protocol (MCP).   Features: â€¢ Search arXiv papers with advanced filtering â€¢ Download and store papers locally as markdown â€¢ Read and analyze paper content â€¢ Deep research analysis prompts â€¢ Local paper management and storage â€¢ Enhanced tool descriptions optimized for local AI models â€¢ Docker MCP Gateway compatible with detailed context  Perfect for researchers, academics, and AI assistants conducting literature reviews and research analysis.  **Recent Update**: Enhanced tool descriptions specifically designed to resolve local AI model confusion and improve Docker MCP Gateway compatibility.

storagePath.description: Directory path where downloaded papers will be stored

pythonRefactoring.title: Python Refactoring Assistant
pythonRefactoring.description: Educational Python refactoring assistant that provides guided suggestions for AI assistants.  Features: â€¢ Step-by-step refactoring instructions without modifying code â€¢ Comprehensive code analysis using professional tools (Rope, Radon, Vulture, Jedi, LibCST, Pyrefly) â€¢ Educational approach teaching refactoring patterns through guided practice â€¢ Support for both guide-only and apply-changes modes â€¢ Identifies long functions, high complexity, dead code, and type issues â€¢ Provides precise line numbers and specific refactoring instructions â€¢ Compatible with all AI assistants (Claude, GPT, Cursor, Continue, etc.)  Perfect for developers learning refactoring patterns while maintaining full control over code changes. Acts as a refactoring mentor rather than an automated code modifier.

rustMcpFilesystem.title: Blazing-fast, asynchronous MCP server for seamless filesystem operations.
rustMcpFilesystem.description: The Rust MCP Filesystem is a high-performance, asynchronous, and lightweight Model Context Protocol (MCP) server built in Rust for secure and efficient filesystem operations. Designed with security in mind, it operates in read-only mode by default and restricts clients from updating allowed directories via MCP Roots unless explicitly enabled, ensuring robust protection against unauthorized access. Leveraging asynchronous I/O, it delivers blazingly fast performance with a minimal resource footprint. Optimized for token efficiency, the Rust MCP Filesystem enables large language models (LLMs) to precisely target searches and edits within specific sections of large files and restrict operations by file size range, making it ideal for efficient file exploration, automation, and system integration.

allowWrite.description: Enable read/write mode. If false, the app operates in read-only mode.

allowedDirectories.description: List of directories that rust-mcp-filesystem can access.

enableRoots.description: Enable dynamic directory access control via MCP client-side Roots.

schemacrawlerAi.title: SchemaCrawler AI
schemacrawlerAi.description: The SchemaCrawler AI MCP Server enables natural language interaction with your database schema using an MCP client in "Agent" mode. It allows users to explore tables, columns, foreign keys, triggers, stored procedures and more simply by asking questions like "Explain the code for the interest calculation stored procedure". You can also ask it to help with SQL, since it knows your schema. This is ideal for developers, DBAs, and data analysts who want to streamline schema comprehension and query development without diving into dense documentation.

generalInfoLevel.description: --info-level How much database metadata to retrieve

volumeHostShare.description: Host volume to map within the Docker container

schoginiMcpImageBorder.title: Schogini MCP Image Border
schoginiMcpImageBorder.description: This adds a border to an image and returns base64 encoded image.

scrapezy.title: Scrapezy
scrapezy.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Scrapezy that enables AI models to extract structured data from websites.

securenoteLink.title: Securenote.link mcp server
securenoteLink.description: SecureNote.link MCP Server - allowing AI agents to securely share sensitive information through end-to-end encrypted notes.

semgrep.title: Semgrep
semgrep.description: MCP server for using Semgrep to scan code for security vulnerabilities.

sentry.title: Sentry (Archived)
sentry.description: A Model Context Protocol server for retrieving and analyzing issues from Sentry.io. This server provides tools to inspect error reports, stacktraces, and other debugging information from your Sentry account.

sequa.title: Sequa.AI
sequa.description: Stop stitching context for Copilot and Cursor. With Sequa MCP, your AI tools know your entire codebase and docs out of the box.

sequentialthinking.title: Sequential Thinking (Reference)
sequentialthinking.description: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thought sequences.

shortIo.title: Short.io
shortIo.description: Access to Short.io's link shortener and analytics tools.

singlestore.title: Singlestore
singlestore.description: MCP server for interacting with SingleStore Management API and services.

slack.title: Slack (Archived)
slack.description: Interact with Slack Workspaces over the Slack API.

smartbear.title: SmartBear MCP Server
smartbear.description: MCP server for AI access to SmartBear tools, including BugSnag, Reflect, API Hub, PactFlow.

sonarqube.title: SonarQube
sonarqube.description: Interact with SonarQube Cloud, Server and Community build over the web API. Analyze code to identify quality and security issues.

org.description: Organization key for SonarQube Cloud, not required for SonarQube Server or Community Build

url.description: URL of the SonarQube instance, to provide only for SonarQube Server or Community Build

sqlite.title: SQLite (Archived)
sqlite.description: Database interaction and business intelligence capabilities.

stackgen.title: StackGen
stackgen.description: AI-powered DevOps assistant for managing cloud infrastructure and applications.

stackhawk.title: StackHawk
stackhawk.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for integrating with StackHawk's security scanning platform. Provides security analytics, YAML configuration management, sensitive data/threat surface analysis, and anti-hallucination tools for LLMs.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.description: Interact with Stripe services over the Stripe API.

supadata.title: Supadata
supadata.description: Official Supadata MCP Server - Adds powerful video & web scraping to Cursor, Claude and any other LLM clients.

suzieq.title: Suzieq MCP
suzieq.description: MCP Server to interact with a SuzieQ network observability instance via its REST API.

taskOrchestrator.title: Task orchestrator
taskOrchestrator.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for comprehensive task and feature management, providing AI assistants with a structured, context-efficient way to interact with project data.

tavily.title: Tavily
tavily.description: The Tavily MCP server provides seamless interaction with the tavily-search and tavily-extract tools, real-time web search capabilities through the tavily-search tool and Intelligent data extraction from web pages via the tavily-extract tool.

telnyx.title: Telnyx
telnyx.description: Enables interaction with powerful telephony, messaging, and AI assistant APIs.

tembo.title: Tembo
tembo.description: MCP server for Tembo Cloud's platform API.

terraform.title: Hashicorp Terraform
terraform.description: The Terraform MCP Server provides seamless integration with Terraform ecosystem, enabling advanced automation and interaction capabilities for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) development.

textToGraphql.title: Text-to-GraphQL
textToGraphql.description: Transform natural language queries into GraphQL queries using an AI agent. Provides schema management, query validation, execution, and history tracking.

tigris.title: Tigris Data
tigris.description: Tigris is a globally distributed S3-compatible object storage service that provides low latency anywhere in the world, enabling developers to store and access any amount of data for a wide range of use cases.

unrealEngine.title: Unreal Engine MCP Server
unrealEngine.description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to control Unreal Engine via Remote Control API. Built with TypeScript and designed for game development automation.

ueHost.description: Unreal Engine host address. Use: host.docker.internal for local UE on Windows/Mac Docker, 127.0.0.1 for Linux without Docker, or actual IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.100) for remote UE

veyrax.title: VeyraX
veyrax.description: VeyraX MCP is the only connection you need to access all your tools in any MCP-compatible environment.

vizro.title: Vizro
vizro.description: provides tools and templates to create a functioning Vizro chart or dashboard step by step.

vulnNist.title: Vuln nist mcp server
vulnNist.description: This MCP server exposes tools to query the NVD/CVE REST API and return formatted text results suitable for LLM consumption via the MCP protocol. It includes automatic query chunking for large date ranges and parallel processing for improved performance.

wayfound.title: Wayfound MCP
wayfound.description: Wayfoundâ€™s MCP server allows business users to govern, supervise, and improve AI Agents.

webflow.title: Webflow
webflow.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for the Webflow Data API.

wikipedia.title: Wikipedia
wikipedia.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that retrieves information from Wikipedia to provide context to LLMs.

wolframAlpha.title: WolframAlpha
wolframAlpha.description: Connect your chat repl to wolfram alpha computational intelligence.

youtubeTranscript.title: YouTube transcripts
youtubeTranscript.description: Retrieves transcripts for given YouTube video URLs.

zerodhaKite.title: Zerodha Kite Connect
zerodhaKite.description: MCP server for Zerodha Kite Connect API - India's leading stock broker trading platform. Execute trades, manage portfolios, and access real-time market data for NSE, BSE, and other Indian exchanges.

kiteAccessToken.description: Access token obtained after OAuth authentication (optional - can be generated at runtime)

kiteApiKey.description: Your Kite Connect API key from the developer console

kiteRedirectUrl.description: OAuth redirect URL configured in your Kite Connect app
